text: Mario Pejazic (born 21 January 2005) is an Austrian professional footballer. He plays as a left back for 2. Liga club Liefering.Profile on transfermarkt.at (German) ==Career== He started his career with SK Vorw√§rts Steyr and went on to LASK Linz. From 2018 to 2022 he played for the Red Bull Salzburg Academy. 2022 he was promoted to FC Liefering. His debut for Liefering was in July 2022 , when he started in the first round of Second league versus Young Violets Austria Wien. He also played for Austria U 15 and U17 national team. ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Liefering players Category:Austrian football defenders
title: Mario Pejazic
